liu-process-communication:
#include<iostream>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<thread>
/**
project: 进程通信
time: 2022/11/23 11：19
author: 刘智文
description: 本程序实现了运用消息缓冲队列的直接消息传递系统。该程序利用 send 原语将消息直接发送给接受进程，接收进程利用 receive 原语文接收消息。
*/
using namespace std;
void wait(int& a) {
while (a == 0);
a -= 1;
}
void signal(int& a) {
a += 1;
}
void sleep(int ms) {
this_thread::sleep_for(chrono::milliseconds(ms));
}
typedef struct message_buffer {
message_buffer* addr;
string sender;
int size;
string text;
struct message_buffer* next = 0;
};
typedef struct processcontrol_block {
int id;
struct message_buffer mq;
int mutex = 1;
int sm = 1;
}PCB;
void releasebuf(message_buffer& i) {
i.sender = NAN;
i.size = 0;
i.text = "";
i.next = 0;
}
void send(PCB& B, message_buffer& a, message_buffer& i, message_buffer& b) {
cout << "执行 send。缓冲区 i。sender：" << a.sender << ".接收：B" << endl;
i.sender = a.sender;
i.size = a.size;
i.text = a.text;
i.next = 0;
wait(B.mutex);
b.addr = &i;
signal(B.mutex);
signal(B.sm);
}
void receive(PCB& B, message_buffer& i, message_buffer& b) {
cout << "执行：receive" << endl;
wait(B.sm);
wait(B.mutex);
b.addr = NULL;
b.sender = i.sender;
b.size = i.size;
b.text = i.text;
releasebuf(i);
cout << "b 收到消息：" << b.text << ", 来自进程：" << b.sender << endl;
}
string get_string_input() {
string buff;
cin >> buff;
return buff;
}
void test() {
PCB A, B; //两个进程
message_buffer a, i, b; //消息缓冲
cout << "请输入缓冲区 a 的文本：" << endl;
a.text = get_string_input(); a.sender = "A";
cout << "设置 A 的消息缓冲区 a 的文本为：" << a.text << endl;
A.mq = a; B.mq = b;
send(B, a, i, b);
receive(B, i, b);
}
int main() {
while (true) {
test();
}
}

liu-edf-llf:
#include<iostream>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<thread>
/*
project:利用算法最早截止时间(非抢占）和最低松弛度实现进程调度
time:2022/11/16 14：44
author:刘智文
*/
using namespace std;
class PCB {
public:
int ifFinished = false;
int id;
int arrive_time;
int require_time;
int must_begin_time;
int must_down_time;
int laxity;
PCB() {
}
}pcb[3];
void EDF(PCB* pcb);
int NOWTIME = 0;
void printEDFPCB(PCB* pcb) {
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
if (pcb[i].ifFinished == true) {
cout << "进程" << i << "已完成" << endl;
}
else {
cout << "进程" << pcb[i].id << "在时间" << pcb[i].arrive_time << "到达，需要运行" << pcb[i].require_time << "时间,最早截止时间为：" << pcb[i].must_begin_time << endl;
}
}
}
void workEDF(PCB& workpcb) {
NOWTIME += workpcb.require_time;
workpcb.ifFinished = true;
cout << "进程" << workpcb.id << "运行完成。\n\n当前状态：" << endl;
printEDFPCB(pcb);
cout << endl;
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
if (pcb[i].ifFinished == false) {
EDF(pcb);
return;
}
}
cout << "运行完毕" << endl;
}
void EDF(PCB* pcb) {
cout << "当前时间" << NOWTIME << endl;
int shouldworkid = -1;
int must_begin_time = 1000;
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
if (pcb[i].ifFinished == false && pcb[i].arrive_time <= NOWTIME && pcb[i].must_begin_time < must_begin_time) {
shouldworkid = pcb[i].id;
must_begin_time = pcb[i].must_begin_time;
}
}
cout << "开始进程" << shouldworkid << ",共使用" << pcb[shouldworkid].require_time << "时间" << endl;
workEDF(pcb[shouldworkid]);
}
void printLLFPCB() {
cout << "当前时间：" << NOWTIME << endl;
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
pcb[i].laxity = pcb[i].must_down_time - pcb[i].require_time - NOWTIME;
if (pcb[i].ifFinished == true) {
cout << "进程" << i << "已完成" << endl;
}
else {
cout << "进程" << pcb[i].id << "需要运行" << pcb[i].require_time << " 时间, 最晚完成时间为：" << pcb[i].must_down_time << ", 松弛度为" << pcb[i].laxity << endl;
}
}
}
void LLF(PCB* pcb);
void workLLF(PCB& workpcb) {
NOWTIME += workpcb.require_time;
workpcb.ifFinished = true;
cout << "进程" << workpcb.id << "运行完成。\n\n当前状态：" << endl;
printLLFPCB();
cout << endl;
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
if (pcb[i].ifFinished == false) {
LLF(pcb);
return;
}
}
cout << "运行完毕" << endl;
}
void LLF(PCB* pcb) {
int minlaxity = 1000;
int shouldworkid = -1;
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
if (pcb[i].ifFinished == false && pcb[i].laxity < minlaxity) {
minlaxity = pcb[i].laxity;
shouldworkid = pcb[i].id;
}
}
cout << "开始进程" << shouldworkid << ",共使用" << pcb[shouldworkid].require_time << "时间" << endl;
workLLF(pcb[shouldworkid]);
}
void resetPCB() {
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
pcb[i] = PCB();
}
}
int main() {
resetPCB();
NOWTIME = 0;
cout << "1.利用最早截止 时间实现进程调度" << endl;
pcb[0].id = 0; pcb[1].id = 1; pcb[2].id = 2;
pcb[0].arrive_time = 0; pcb[1].arrive_time = 2; pcb[2].arrive_time = 3;
pcb[0].require_time = 3; pcb[1].require_time = 1; pcb[2].require_time = 2;
pcb[0].must_begin_time = 2; pcb[1].must_begin_time = 4; pcb[2].must_begin_time = 3;
cout << "初始状态为：" << endl;
printEDFPCB(pcb);
cout << endl;
EDF(pcb);
cout << "2.利用最低松弛度优先实现进程调度" << endl;
NOWTIME = 0;
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
pcb[i].ifFinished = false;
pcb[i].require_time = 10 + 10 * i;
}
pcb[0].must_down_time = 20;
pcb[1].must_down_time = 60;
pcb[2].must_down_time = 65;
cout << "初始状态为：" << endl;
printLLFPCB();
cout << endl;
LLF(pcb);
cout << endl;
}

joe-fs:
import { ChevronRight, ExpandMore } from "@mui/icons-material";
import { TreeItem, TreeView } from "@mui/lab";
import { Box, Button, Container, Grid, Paper, Typography, TextField, Divider } from "@mui/material";
import React from "react";
import { useState, useCallback, useEffect } from "react";
import TabbedPlaygroundTemplate from "../../components/TabbedPlaygroundTemplate";
import useAsync from "../../scripts/useAsync";
class TreeNode<T> {
root: T;
children: TreeNode<T>[];
constructor(root: T) {
this.root = root;
this.children = [];
};
};
interface TreeViewObject {
id: string;
name: string;
type: 'file' | 'directory';
children?: this[]
};
const findIdObj = (obj: TreeViewObject, id: string) => {
if (obj.id === id) return obj;
if (!obj.children) return null;
let arr: (TreeViewObject | null)[] = [];
for (const i of obj.children) {
arr.push(findIdObj(i, id));
}
arr = arr.filter((v) => v);
if (arr.length) {
return arr[0];
}
return null;
};
const getSizeString = (size: number) => {
if (size < 1024) return `${size} B`;
if (size < 1024 * 1024) return `${(size / 1024).toFixed(2)} KB`;
if (size < 1024 * 1024 * 1024) return `${(size / 1024 / 1024).toFixed(2)} MB`;
if (size < 1024 * 1024 * 1024 * 1024) return `${(size / 1024 / 1024 / 1024).toFixed(2)} GB`;
}
const renderTree = (nodes: TreeViewObject) => (
<TreeItem key={nodes.id} nodeId={nodes.id} label={nodes.name}>
{Array.isArray(nodes.children) ?
nodes.children.map((v) => renderTree(v))
: null}
</TreeItem>
);
function PaperFileSystemAccess() {
const [rootHandle, setRootHandle] = useState<FileSystemDirectoryHandle | null>(null);
// 存……
/* 按 ID 索引拿 Handle 的 Map (不要把 handle 翻译成句柄，这翻译很烂的) */
const [fsNodeMap, setFsNodeMap] = useState<Map<number, TreeNode<FileSystemDirectoryHandle | FileSystemFileHandle>>>();
/* 按 ID 记录的树状结构, Rerender Hook */
const [fsTreeViewObject, setFsTreeViewObject] = useState<TreeViewObject>();
// 这个是文字提示
const [selectedInfo, setSelectedInfo] = useState('showDirectoryPicker' in window ? '' : '你的浏览器不支持 File System Access API。');
const asyncShowDirectoryPicker = useCallback(async () => {
if (!window.showDirectoryPicker) throw new Error('u browser blew up');
return window.showDirectoryPicker({
id: 'file-system-access-demo',
mode: 'read'
});
}, []);
const onResolved = useCallback((handle: FileSystemDirectoryHandle) => {
setRootHandle(handle);
const newNode = new TreeNode(handle);
const newMap = new Map<number, TreeNode<FileSystemDirectoryHandle | FileSystemFileHandle>>();
newMap.set(0, newNode);
setFsNodeMap(newMap);
setFsTreeViewObject({ id: '0', name: handle.name, type: 'directory' });
// 展开一下……
}, []);
const onError = useCallback((err: unknown) => {
console.log(err);
}, []);
const showDirectoryPicker = useAsync(asyncShowDirectoryPicker, onResolved, onError);
useEffect(() => {
if (!rootHandle) return;
handleSelect('', '0');
}, [rootHandle]);
const handleSelect = useCallback(async (_: React.SyntheticEvent | any, nodeIds: string | string[]) => {
// 这里应该是 string 而非 string[]
if (Array.isArray(nodeIds) || !fsNodeMap || !fsTreeViewObject) return;
/** 当前选中的这个树节点 */
let fileHandleNode = fsNodeMap.get(+nodeIds);
if (!fileHandleNode) return;
let root = fileHandleNode.root;
// file
if (root instanceof FileSystemFileHandle) {
let fileInfo = await root.getFile();
setSelectedInfo(`${fileInfo.name} (${getSizeString(fileInfo.size)})`);
return;
}
// 是目录：
/** 树状结构的此处节点 */
let linkedObjectPosition = findIdObj(fsTreeViewObject, nodeIds);
if (!linkedObjectPosition) {
setSelectedInfo('出错 (未知错误)');
return;
}
if (root instanceof FileSystemDirectoryHandle) {
/** 清空重新填 */
linkedObjectPosition.children = [];
fileHandleNode.children = [];
/** 展开下级，便于 TreeNode 组件显示展开提示符号 */
const toBeUnfolded: [FileSystemDirectoryHandle, TreeNode<FileSystemDirectoryHandle | FileSystemFileHandle>, TreeViewObject][] = [];
for await (const handle of root.values()) {
const newID = fsNodeMap.size;
const newNode = new TreeNode(handle);
fileHandleNode.children.push(newNode);
fsNodeMap.set(newID, newNode);
const newEmbeddedObject = { id: newID + '', name: handle.name, type: handle.kind };
linkedObjectPosition.children.push(newEmbeddedObject);
if (handle.kind === 'directory') {
toBeUnfolded.push([handle, newNode, newEmbeddedObject]);
}
}
linkedObjectPosition.children.sort((a, b) => {
if (a.type === 'directory' && b.type === 'file') return -1;
if (a.type === 'file' && b.type === 'directory') return 1;
return a.name > b.name ? 1 : -1;
});
// 向下只展开一级
for (const [what, theTreeNode, theViewObject] of toBeUnfolded) {
theTreeNode.children = [];
theViewObject.children = [];
for await (const handle of what.values()) {
const newID = fsNodeMap.size;
const newNode = new TreeNode(handle);
theTreeNode.children.push(newNode);
fsNodeMap.set(newID, newNode);
theViewObject.children.push({ id: newID + '', name: handle.name, type: handle.kind });
}
theViewObject.children.sort((a, b) => {
if (a.type === 'directory' && b.type === 'file') return -1;
if (a.type === 'file' && b.type === 'directory') return 1;
return a.name > b.name ? 1 : -1;
});
}
}
// Rerender Hook
setFsTreeViewObject((prev) => (prev ? { ...prev } : undefined));
}, [fsNodeMap, fsTreeViewObject])
return <Paper>
<Container maxWidth="lg" sx={{ p: 2 }}>
<Typography variant="h6" fontWeight="bolder" gutterBottom textAlign={"center"}
borderBottom={1} borderColor="divider"
>
外存访问
</Typography>
<Typography variant="body2" gutterBottom textAlign="center">
访问操作系统的文件系统，观察其组织结构
</Typography>
<TabbedPlaygroundTemplate
tabs={1}
tabNames={[
"文件系统访问",
]}
tabNodes={[
<Box>
<Grid container spacing={2}>
<Grid item xs={12} sm={8}>
<Typography gutterBottom variant="body1" sx={{ textIndent: "2rem" }}>
操作系统的文件系统会以树状结构来组织。你可以在这里选择一个目录、然后查看其层次结构。
</Typography>
</Grid>
<Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
<Typography color="primary" sx={{
fontWeight: "bolder"
}}
variant="body1"
>组员: 乔译</Typography>
<Typography color="primary" sx={{
fontWeight: "bolder"
}}
variant="body1"
gutterBottom
borderBottom={1}
borderColor="divider"
>程序语言: TypeScript (React)</Typography>
<Button variant="contained"
children={'showDirectoryPicker' in window ? '选择本地目录' : '浏览器不支持'}
disabled={!('showDirectoryPicker' in window)}
onClick={showDirectoryPicker}
/>
</Grid>
<Grid item xs={12}>
<Typography variant='body1' gutterBottom>{
rootHandle ? (
selectedInfo ||
`根目名称: ${rootHandle.name}`
) : '没有选择目录'
}</Typography>
{rootHandle &&
<TreeView
defaultCollapseIcon={<ExpandMore />}
defaultExpandIcon={<ChevronRight />}
onNodeSelect={handleSelect}
>
{fsTreeViewObject ? renderTree(fsTreeViewObject) : null}
</TreeView>
}
</Grid>
</Grid>
</Box>
]}
/>
</Container>
</Paper>
}
export default PaperFileSystemAccess;

chen-banker:
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
/*本程序为课本P122-123的银行家算法避免死锁的程序实现。*/
int Max[5][3] = { {7,5,3},{3,2,2},{9,0,2},{2,2,2},{4,3,3} };
int Allocation[5][3] = { {0,1,0},{2,0,0},{3,0,2},{2,1,1},{0,0,2} };
int Need[5][3] = { {7,4,3},{1,2,2},{6,0,0},{0,1,1},{4,3,1} };
int Available[3] = { 3,3,2 }; /*上述为题目对应的Max、Allocation、Need矩阵*/
int t = 3; /*资源类数为3*/
bool compare(int a[], int b[]) {
for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
if (a[i] < b[i])
return false;
}
return true;
}
bool stest() { /*安全性验证算法*/
int Finish[5];
int Work[3];
bool flag = false;
for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)
Finish[i] = 0;
for (int i = 0; i < t; i++)
Work[i] = Available[i];
cout << "分配序列" << endl;
cout << "allocation need available";
for (int k = 0; k < 5; k++) {
for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
if (Finish[i] == 1)
continue;
else {
if (compare(Work, Need[i])) {
Finish[i] = 1;
cout << "\n" << "进程" << i + 1 << '\t';
flag = true;
for (int j = 0; j < t; j++)
cout << Allocation[i][j] << " ";
cout << " ";
for (int j = 0; j < t; j++)
cout << Need[i][j] << " ";
cout << " ";
for (int j = 0; j < t; j++)
cout << Work[j] + Allocation[i][j] << " ";
for (int r = 0; r < t; r++)
Work[r] += Allocation[i][r];
break;
}
if (i < t)
continue;
}
if (flag == true)
break;
}
}
cout << "\n";
for (int r = 0; r < 5; r++) {
if (Finish[r] == 0)
return false;
}
return true;
}
void rtest(int n,int Request[]) { /*银行家算法*/
if (compare(Available, Request) && compare(Need[n - 1], Request)) {
for (int j = 0; j < t; j++) {
Allocation[n - 1][j] += Request[j];
Need[n - 1][j] -= Request[j];
Available[j] -= Request[j];
}
if (stest())
cout << "允许" << n << "进程申请资源\n";
else {
cout << "不允许" << n << "进程申请资源\n";
for (int j = 0; j < t; j++) {
Allocation[n - 1][j] -= Request[j];
Need[n - 1][j] += Request[j];
Available[j] += Request[j];
}
}
}
else
cout << "申请资源量越界，进程" << n << "等待\n";
}
int main() {
if (stest())
cout << "初始状态是安全的\n";
else
cout << "初始状态不安全\n";
int Request1[3] = { 1,0,2 };
rtest(2,Request1); /*P1请求资源发出请求向量，系统运行*/
int Request4[3] = { 3,3,0 };
rtest(5,Request4); /*P4请求资源*/
int Request0[3] = { 0,2,0 };
rtest(1,Request0); /*P0请求资源*/
return 0;
}

lrx-threads:
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
int recover = 0;//寻找执行完本次时间片就从就绪态进入完成态的线程
struct PCB {
int Id; //线程标识数
int Priority; //优先权 优先数越大则优先级越高
int CPU_time; //已占用的cpu时间片
int All_time; //还需要的时间
int Start_block; //运行多少个时间片之后开始进入阻塞状态
int Block_time; //阻塞的时间
int State; // 状态 0为就绪 1为阻塞 2为完成
};
//赋值
struct PCB p[5] =
{
{0,9,0,3,2,3,0},
{1,38,0,3,-1,0,0},
{2,30,0,6,-1,0,0},
{3,29,0,3,-1,0,0},
{4,0,0,4,-1,0,0}
};
//容器，当作队列用
vector<PCB> ready_queue;//就绪队列
vector<PCB> block_queue;//阻塞队列
vector<PCB> finish_queue;//结束队列
//输出函数
void print() {
//若此线程结束，会直接进入结束队列，则ready_queue中的id会成为下一个
//3,9,12,16
if (!ready_queue.empty())
if (recover == 0)
cout << "running prog:" << ready_queue[0].Id << endl;
else {
cout << "running prog:" << finish_queue[finish_queue.size() - 1].Id << endl;
recover = 0;
}
else
cout << "running prog:" << endl;
cout << "ready_queue:";
for (int i = 0; i < ready_queue.size(); i++) {
cout << "-> " << ready_queue[i].Id;
}
cout << endl;
cout << "block_queue:";
for (int i = 0; i < block_queue.size(); i++) {
cout << "-> " << block_queue[i].Id;
}
cout << endl;
cout << "finish_queue:";
for (int i = 0; i < finish_queue.size(); i++) {
cout << "->" << finish_queue[i].Id;
}
cout << endl;
cout << "id\t prio\t cpu_time\t all_time\t ";
cout << "start_block\t block_time\t state" << endl;
for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
if (!ready_queue.empty()) {
for (int a = 0; a < ready_queue.size(); a++) {
if (ready_queue[a].Id == i) {
cout << ready_queue[a].Id << "\t" << ready_queue[a].Priority << "\t" << "\t" << ready_queue[a].CPU_time << "\t";
cout << "\t" << ready_queue[a].All_time << "\t" << "\t" << ready_queue[a].Start_block << "\t" << "\t" << ready_queue[a].Block_time << "\t" << "\t" << ready_queue[a].State << endl;
break;
}
}
}
if (!block_queue.empty()) {
for (int b = 0; b < block_queue.size(); b++) {
if (block_queue[b].Id == i) {
cout << block_queue[b].Id << "\t" << block_queue[b].Priority << "\t" << "\t" << block_queue[b].CPU_time << "\t";
cout << "\t" << block_queue[b].All_time << "\t" << "\t" << block_queue[b].Start_block << "\t" << "\t" << block_queue[b].Block_time << "\t" << "\t" << block_queue[b].State << endl;
break;
}
}
}
if (!finish_queue.empty()) {
for (int c = 0; c < finish_queue.size(); c++) {
if (finish_queue[c].Id == i) {
cout << finish_queue[c].Id << "\t" << finish_queue[c].Priority << "\t" << "\t" << finish_queue[c].CPU_time << "\t";
cout << "\t" << finish_queue[c].All_time << "\t" << "\t" << finish_queue[c].Start_block << "\t" << "\t" << finish_queue[c].Block_time << "\t" << "\t" << finish_queue[c].State << endl;
break;
}
}
}
}
}
//每一个时钟脉冲之后，就对就绪队列的内容重新排序
void sortqueue() {
//判断ready_queue和block_queue里面还有线程控制块，若没有则直接返回
if ((ready_queue.empty()) && (block_queue.empty()))
return;
//若不为空，则使用冒泡排序的方法将优先数大的放在前面，表示优先级高，先执行
else {
for (int i = 0; i < ready_queue.size() - 1; i++) {
for (int j = i + 1; j < ready_queue.size(); j++) {
if (ready_queue[i].Priority < ready_queue[j].Priority) {
swap(ready_queue[i], ready_queue[j]); //冒泡算法，swap交换函数
}
}
}
}
}
//执行函数，其实是执行的就是就绪队列的第一个单元，
//执行相当于对第一个元素的某些值进行加减。
void run() {
if (!ready_queue.empty()) { //就绪队列不为空
ready_queue[0].Priority -= 3;//线程每运行一个时间片，优先数减3
ready_queue[0].CPU_time++;//每运行一个时间片则已占用CPU时间+1
ready_queue[0].All_time--;//每运行一个时间片则还需要的时间-1
//除了执行线程以外的线程优先权加1
for (int i = 1; i < ready_queue.size(); i++)
ready_queue[i].Priority += 1;
//已阻塞的线程再等待Block_time个时间片后，将转换成就绪状态。
if (!block_queue.empty()) {
for (int i = 0; i < block_queue.size(); i++) {
block_queue[i].Block_time--;
//当阻塞时间为0时，则认为线程从阻塞状态转为就绪状态
if (block_queue[i].Block_time == 0) {
block_queue[i].State = 0;//把此线程从阻塞状态转为就绪状态
//将此线程加入就绪队列
ready_queue.push_back(block_queue[i]);
//将此线程从阻塞队列中删除
block_queue.erase(block_queue.begin() + i);
}
}
}/*至此，是一个时间片对于某些因素的改变，至于是否到了队列变换的时候，下方再去判断*/
//全部遍历一遍，是否需要去阻塞
for (int i = 0; i < ready_queue.size(); i++) {
if (ready_queue[i].Start_block > 0) {
ready_queue[i].Start_block--;
//去阻塞
if (ready_queue[i].Start_block == 0) {
ready_queue[i].State = 1;//状态为1 阻塞
//移入阻塞队列，移出就绪队列
block_queue.push_back(ready_queue[i]);
ready_queue.erase(ready_queue.begin() + i);
}
}
}
//没有执行时间，调入到结束队列
if (ready_queue[0].All_time <= 0) {
ready_queue[0].State = 2;//状态为2 结束
//将recover值赋为1，去记录此队列被从就绪队列被移入结束队列
recover = 1;
finish_queue.push_back(ready_queue[0]);// push_back最后一个向量后插入一个元素
ready_queue.erase(ready_queue.begin() + 0);//删除第0个元素，并将后面的前移一位
}
}
}
int main() {
//将所有的pcb输入到就绪队列里面，再去排序
for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
ready_queue.push_back(p[i]);
}
int num = 1;
for (; !ready_queue.empty();) {
cout << num++ << "--------------------实时状态------------------------" << endl;
sortqueue();
run();
print();
cout << endl << endl;
}
cout << "运行完成" << endl << "运行时序为";
for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)
{
cout << " " << finish_queue[i].Id;
}
return 0;
}

lzw-mem-allocation:
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
/*
project:利用快速适应算法实现动态分区分配
time:2022/11/29 14:44
author:刘智文
description:将各空闲区按照其存取大小进行分类，并将基于索引搜索的动
态分区分配算法 为了提高搜索空间的分区的速度,在中大型系
统中往往会采用基于索引搜索的动态分区分配算法，
*/
struct memory_2kb {
memory_2kb* before;
string name;
int size = 2;
bool ifAllocated = false;
memory_2kb* next;
}A[3], headA, pointA;
struct memory_4kb {
memory_4kb* before;
string name;
int size = 4;
bool ifAllocated = false;
memory_4kb* next;
}B[3], headB, pointB;
struct memory_8kb {
memory_8kb* before;
string name;
int size = 8;
bool ifAllocated = false;
memory_8kb* next;
}C[3], headC, pointC;
void initMemoryArea() {
headA.before = nullptr; headB.before = nullptr; headC.before = nullptr;
headA.next = &A[0]; headB.next = &B[0]; headC.next = &C[0];
A[0].before = &headA; B[0].before = &headB; C[0].before = &headC;
A[0].next = &A[1]; B[0].next = &B[1]; C[0].next = &C[1];
A[1].before = &A[0]; B[1].before = &B[0]; C[1].before = &C[0];
A[1].next = &A[2]; B[1].next = &B[2]; C[1].next = &C[2];
A[2].before = &A[1]; B[2].before = &B[1]; C[2].before = &C[1];
A[2].next = nullptr; B[2].next = nullptr; C[2].next = nullptr;
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
A[i].name = string("A") + to_string(i);
B[i].name = string("B") + to_string(i);
C[i].name = string("C") + to_string(i);
}
pointA = headA;
pointB = headB;
pointC = headC;
}
void printFreeMemory() {
pointA = headA;
pointB = headB;
pointC = headC;
cout << "当前空闲分区链为：" << endl;
cout << "2kb空闲：";
while (pointA.next) {
pointA = *pointA.next;
if (pointA.ifAllocated == false)
cout << pointA.name << " ";
}
cout << endl;
cout << "4kb空闲：";
while (pointB.next) {
pointB = *pointB.next;
if (pointB.ifAllocated == false)
cout << pointB.name << " ";
}
cout << endl;
cout << "8kb空闲：";
while (pointC.next) {
pointC = *pointC.next;
if (pointC.ifAllocated == false)
cout << pointC.name << " ";
}
cout << endl;
}
int get_int_input() {
int buff;
cin >> buff;
return buff;
}
string get_string_input() {
string buff;
cin >> buff;
return buff;
}
void allocate();
void continueAllocateMemory() {
cout << "是否继续分配？（Y/N）" << endl;
string continueAllocation = get_string_input();
if (continueAllocation == string("y") || continueAllocation == string("Y")) {
allocate();
}
else if (continueAllocation == string("n") || continueAllocation == string("N")) {
}
else {
cout << "未定义的输入。" << endl;
}
}
void allocate() {
cout << "请输入需要分配的大小 (KB): " << endl;
int need = get_int_input();
if (need > 8 || need < 0) {
cout << "无合适空闲分区。" << endl;
}
else if (need == 0) {
cout << "分配完毕。什么都没有发生。" << endl;
}
else {
if (need <= 2) {
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
if (A[i].ifAllocated == false) {
A[i].ifAllocated = true;
cout << "分配了" << A[i].name << endl;
break;
}
}
}
else if (need <= 4) {
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
if (B[i].ifAllocated == false) {
B[i].ifAllocated = true;
cout << "分配了" << B[i].name << endl;
break;
}
}
}
else {
for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
if (C[i].ifAllocated == false) {
C[i].ifAllocated = true;
cout << "分配了" << C[i].name << endl;
break;
}
}
}
}
printFreeMemory();
continueAllocateMemory();
}
int main() {
cout << "利用快速适应算法实现动态分区分配" << endl;
initMemoryArea();
printFreeMemory();
allocate();
}
